name: 3dsvm
author: AFNI Team
description: Support vector machine analysis of brain data using the SVM-light package

inputs.description: A 3D+t AFNI brik dataset to be used for training.
inputs.name: Training volume

inputs.description: Filename of class category .1D labels corresponding to the stimulus paradigm for the training data set.
inputs.name: Training labels

inputs.description: Specify a mask dataset to only perform the analysis on non-zero mask voxels.
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Flag to enable the omission of a mask file. Required if '-mask' is not used.
inputs.name: No model mask flag

inputs.description: The basename for the model brik containing the SVM model during training or testing.
inputs.name: Model name

inputs.description: Write the alphas to a specified .1D file.
inputs.name: Alpha file

inputs.description: Outputs the sum of weighted linear support vectors written out to a functional (fim) brik file.
inputs.name: Bucket file

inputs.description: Specify type: classification (default) or regression.
inputs.name: Type

inputs.description: Control SVM model complexity (C value).
inputs.name: C value

inputs.description: Specify epsilon for regression.
inputs.name: Epsilon

inputs.description: Specify type of kernel function.
inputs.name: Kernel function

inputs.description: D parameter in polynomial kernel.
inputs.name: D value

inputs.description: Gamma parameter in rbf kernel.
inputs.name: Gamma

inputs.description: S parameter in sigmoid/poly kernel.
inputs.name: S value

inputs.description: R parameter in sigmoid/poly kernel.
inputs.name: R value

inputs.description: Specify the maximum number of iterations for the optimization. Default is 1 million.
inputs.name: Maximum iterations

inputs.description: Flag to output sum of weighted linear support vectors to the bucket file.
inputs.name: Weight output flag

inputs.description: A 3D or 3D+t AFNI brik dataset to be used for testing.
inputs.name: Testing volume

inputs.description: Basename for .1D prediction files.
inputs.name: Predictions

inputs.description: Flag to specify that prediction files should be integer-valued, corresponding to class category decisions.
inputs.name: Class-out flag

inputs.description: Do not write predicted values for censored time-points to predictions file.
inputs.name: No predicted censored flag

inputs.description: Flag to specify that prediction files should NOT be linearly detrended.
inputs.name: No detrend flag

inputs.description: Do not scale predictions. Values below 0.0 correspond to (class A) and values above 0.0 to (class B).
inputs.name: No prediction scaling flag

inputs.description: Filename of 'true' class category .1D labels for the test dataset.
inputs.name: Testing labels

inputs.description: Specify the multiclass algorithm for classification.
inputs.name: Multiclass type

inputs.description: Print help message
inputs.name: Help flag

inputs.description: Print version history
inputs.name: Version flag
